channel.title: Libtorsocks SOCKS V4 connect rejected
channel.description:
On Whonix Workstation 8.2
When I try to do apt-get update this error happens on sourceforge.net repositories and cancels all the process.
Apart from this problem, sourceforge repositories are both slow to download and it takes long time due to a lot of redirections, is it possible to use a better server?
Edit: After a while, I can now update without this error, but this same error has also happened the last time I used Whonix a few days ago.

item.title: Libtorsocks SOCKS V4 connect rejected
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
We should do this. Needs time to implement this. Perhaps in Whonix 9. Created a github issue for it:

github.com/Whonix/Whonix

ask existing mirrors if they are willing to host Whonix's APT repository and Whonix News

opened 01:31PM - 01 May 14 UTC
closed 02:09PM - 22 Sep 14 UTC
adrelanos

As suggested in the forums... For Whonix's APT Repository, the pool and dists folders here http://sourceforge.net/projects/whonixdevelopermetafiles/files/internal/ are relevant. For Whonix News, this folder...

enhancement infrastructure usability

Read full topic
